task: Design and build a modern, mobile-first marketing site for ContaFuel, a healthy meal-prep brand. The site should include: a hero section with a clear value proposition, a 'How it works' section, a signature meals section with macros, a 'Why ContaFuel' benefits block, pricing plans, testimonials, and a final CTA. Focus on fast load, clean layout, and conversion-focused copy.

baseline.description: Default balanced prompts for quality and cost

safety.description: Safety check configuration. run_safety_before_final: run checks before approval. allow_extra_iteration_on_failure: if safety fails on final iteration, grant one extra iteration for fixes

llm_resilience.description: STAGE 3.3: LLM failure resilience configuration. max_retries: number of retry attempts per LLM call. timeout_seconds: request timeout. initial_backoff/max_backoff: exponential backoff parameters. fallback_model: model to use as fallback (e.g. 'gpt-4o-mini'). stage_retry_passes: how many times to revisit failed stages
